name: Ella's mentor
description:
Your teacher has disappeared suddenly and monsters have begun appearing in the forest. You decide to investigate yourself on what is causing this havoc. Cycle, blast and combine elements to fight your way through waves of enemies to save your mentor, but be careful, using the wrong element will cause the creature to become stronger. Be wise and be quick who knows how long your teacher has left.

This game was created for the 8 Bits to Infinity 3 Button Game Jam with the theme of "Cycles." This was my first Game Jam and first published game.

Controls

  • Up - Fire
  • Left / Right - Previous / Next Element
  • Hold Up + Left / Right - Store and Combine Multiple Elements to Attack
  • Hold Left / Right + Up - Turn Clockwise / Counter-Clockwise
  • Hold Left + Hold Right - Pause and Unpause
  • UI Left / Right - Navigate Menu
  • UI Up - Select Button

If you are worried about difficulty then don't worry I forgot to turn off invincibility so blast away to your hearts content. And if there are enemies on top of you that won't die, use your energy blast attack to destroy them.
